Reviews.Title: “Very good location”
Reviews.Author: Karin H
Reviews.Content: stayed nights nice hotel locationthe hotel clean nice extremely double 204 single bed luckily travelled hand luggage otherwise suitcases breakfast bit queue seat staff hotel helpful overall rating clean hotel location local neighbourhood streets hotel offers restaurants authentic enviroment close major tourist locations fine walking distance rest city nice location close forum romanum

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel in the middle of everything”
Reviews.Author: Steve R
Reviews.Content: stayed week hotel solis vacationing rome hotel clean provides nice breakfast staff helpful catered clean bathroom nice hotel close roman forum walk minutes 10 minutes colosseum 20 minutes trevi fountain perfect location definitely stay recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel, staff & location”
Reviews.Author: Wayne T
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel weekend 2023 jan happy overall service received stayed friday monday absolutely complaints absolutely recommend location hotel perfect major tourist locations rome minutes walk local tube station staff extremely friendly hotel clean weekend break expect staff extremely knowledgeable local spoke english happy help additional charge 7 euros internet access trip reasonable rome stay wayne uk

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel with fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: Seb_Phillips
Reviews.Content: wonderful little hotel fantastic location staff brilliant helpful indeed basic clean air conditioning city break business trip days perfect stay planning return rome 2012 defiantly stay solis

Reviews.Title: “Super location”
Reviews.Author: Linda R
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel solis nights managed sights rome fantastic location rome short period close restaurantes nice clean quiet hotel smiling staff stop metro termini absolutely worth recommending rome season turists ques temp 1218 degrees january book guided tour colosseum 10 min roma we´ll

Reviews.Content: liked stay cosy hotel sept 25 oct 1 2011 situated reach sites quickly foot especially estimated support friendly staff namely la rita speaking languages lady helping lot visit rome

Reviews.Title: “Worst service ever!”
Reviews.Author: Enovie
Reviews.Content: worst service encountered hotel booked double superior 2 nights told checked available strange considering booking confirmation single barely change lady front desk annoyed simply told speak receptionist day instead night hardly sleep lot debating receptionist following morning including phone call actually hung finally cleaning lady staff looked eye greeted coming entire stay eventually discount speaking manager checked offered apology mistake easily uncomfortable stay hotel experienced book hotel otherwise perfectly beautiful city

Reviews.Content: obviously tourist staying hotel blocks colosseum forum surrounded nonitalian tourists typical tourist hotel awesomely located near metro buses popular rome destinations ceilings shutters block traffic noise morning sunlight real bathrooms including bidet fullsized hot shower breakfast included satisfy hunger prepare days walking wandering throughout rome staff decent super efficient nor versed english romans proud italians speak english business conversation favorite hotel besides rates location leaned window drying hair staring street colosseum forum mornings local life wine cheese shop owner sweeping sidewalk rolled shutters set produce fresh pears street accompany regular wares deli block ate roman meal 24 hours travel meals stay kilo si spent lazy lunches weather sidewalk boisterous family dinners housemade limoncello hotel solis accommodating fine decent stay neighborhood local personal experiences forsure hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “Location good - service bad”

Reviews.Content: hotel stones throw colosseum forum romanum near piazza venezia near shopping streets downtown metro stations cavour colosseum ours dirty walltowall carpet youre allergic faced street noisy sleep earplugs im light sleeper via cavour busy street night bathroom wasnt clean overall worn breakfast expected dont expect continental breakfast worst dissappointment reception staff cheated minibus transfer airport fiumicino 80 euros 5 people heard correct price 55 euros tried lady reception shouted impolitely 25 euros phone call service own hotel guests

Reviews.Title: “Dont count on actually staying here!”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel location newly refurbished arrival told 2nd floor moved solis hotel outskirts city alternative solis hotel half price near colleseum rough street dodgy entrance hall tiny breakfast weird shaped shared window junk roomoffice door evidence 2nd floor solis feel conned paid advance internet couldnt money checked 1 night found nicer hotel checked sooner money watch

Reviews.Title: “Very basic hotel but clean and very close to colosseum”
Reviews.Author: nyujay2010
Reviews.Content: dont expect lobby nicer clean spacious bed design seriously outdated typical european regarding late 1970s feel bit larger breakfast absolute joke appreciate elevator job dont plan staying cheap price excellent location

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 6 days boyfriend february staff incredibly helpfull clean confortable location near metro station restaurants convenience shops block recomend hotel solis
